scripts.clean-classes: rm -f lib/classes/*.js && rm -f lib/classes/*.js.map && rm -f lib/classes/*.d.ts
scripts.clean-schemas: rm -f lib/schemas/*.js && rm -f lib/schemas/*.js.map && rm -f lib/schemas/*.d.ts
scripts.clean-microdata: rm -f lib/microdata/*.js && rm -f lib/microdata/*.js.map && rm -f lib/microdata/*.d.ts
scripts.clean-enumerable: rm -f lib/enumerable/*.js && rm -f lib/enumerable/*.js.map && rm -f lib/enumerable/*.d.ts
scripts.clean-shared: rm -f lib/shared/*.js && rm -f lib/shared/*.js.map && rm -f lib/shared/*.d.ts
scripts.clean: npm run clean-shared && npm run clean-classes && npm run clean-schemas && npm run clean-microdata && npm run clean-enumerable
